definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 23:9 silver, money (NH id.; Ph Zinj. [[כסף]]; Aram. [[כַּסְפָּא]] kespo0; Palm [[כספא]] Vog:No. 23; As. kaspu; prob. the pale metal Thes al., cf. RS:JPh xiv,125)—´[[כ]] abs. Ge 20:16 +, [[כָָּסֶף]] Ex 21:11 +; cstr. Ge 43:21 +; sf. [[כַּסְפִּי]] Ge 42:28 + 3 t., [[כַּסְפְְּ]] 1Ki 20:3 + 2 t., [[כַּסְפְֶָּ]] Ge 17:13, Is 30:22, [[כַּסְפֵּח]] Is 1:22, [[כַּסְפֵּנוּ]] Ge 31:15 + 2 t., [[כַּסְפָּם]] Ho 8:4 + 6 t.; pl. sf. [[כַּסְפֵּיהֶם]] Ge 42:25, Ge 42:35; —silver, †

= silver ore, raw silver (rare and mostly late) Job 28:1, also (in fig.) Ez Eze 22:20, Eze 22:22, Zec 13:9, Pr 2:4, Pr 17:3, Pr 27:21, Mal 3:3, Mal 3:3, Ps 12:7, Ps 66:10, Is 48:10; ´[[הָגוֹ סִיגים מִכּ]] Pr 25:4 remove dross from silver, cf. [[סִיגִים]] ´[[כ]] Pr 26:23 and ´[[מִגִים כ]] Ez Eze 22:18 (MT; LXX ´[[ס]] ´[[כ]]; Co del. in view of v:Eze 22:20); [[נִמְאָס]] ´[[כ]] Je 6:30 (cf. v:Je 6:29), [[כַּסְפֵּח הָיׇה לְסִיגִים]] Is 1:22. †
sliver as bright, shining, fig. of dove's wings [[כַּנְפֵי יוֹנׇה נֶחְפָּה בַכֶָּסֶף]] Ps 68:14.

silver, as wealth, Ge 13:2 (J) + oft. (c. 54 t. in all; frequently with gold, etc., v. [[זהב]]); [[מְלֽא]] [[וזהב]] ´[[בֵיתוֹ כ]] Nu 22:18, Nu 24:13; fig. of a slave as valuable, [[כַּסְפּוֹ הוּא]] Ex 21:21 (all JE); silver as less valuable than gold 1Ki 10:21 = 2Ch 9:20; cf. also 1Ki 10:27 = 2Ch 1:15, 2Ch 9:27; [[נִבְחָר]] ´[[כ]] choice silver, Pr 18:19, Pr 10:20.
silver as spoil of war (c. [[זהב]], q.v.) Ju Jdg 5:19, 2Sa 8:11 = 1Ch 18:11 + 11 t. †
sliver as merchandise Ez Eze 27:12, Pr 3:14 (´[[סְחַר־כ]]), Zep 1:12; cf. also 1Ki 10:22 = 2Ch 9:21.
silver as costly gift (c. [[זהב]], q.v.) 1Ki 15:18, 1Ki 15:19 = 2Ch 16:2, 2Ch 16:3, 2Ki 16:8, 2Ki 18:15, 2Ch 9:14, 2Ch 17:11, 2Ch 21:3, Is 60:9, Da 11:38 (other instances under

silver as material (c. 117 t. in all; oft. c. [[זהב]], q.v.), of cup Ge 44:2 cf. v:Ge 44:8 (J), trumpets Nu 10:2 (P), ´[[כְּלֵי־כ]] Ge 24:53 (J) +; of idols Ex 20:23, Is 2:20, De 29:16, Ez Eze 16:17, Ps 115:4, Ps 135:15 + 4 t., cf. De 7:25, Je 10:4, Hb Hab 2:19; esp. of fittings of tabern. Ex 26. Ex 27. Ex 36. Ex 38. (19 t.), and those offered by chiefs of people Nu 7 (28 t.), etc.
silver as measure of weight and value (c. 184 t.):—†

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: shekels:—[[שְׁלשִׁים שְׁקָלִים]] ´[[כ]] Ex 21:32 (JE), cf. 2Sa 24:24, Le 5:15, Nu 18:16 (both P), Ne 5:15; also (diff. order) ´[[חֲמִשָּׁה שׁקלים כ]] Le 27:6, Le 27:6 (P), cf. Jos 7:21 (JE), 2Ki 15:20, and ´[[אַרְבַּע מֵאׂת שֶׁקֶל י]] Ge 23:15, Ge 23:16, cf. Le 27:3, Le 27:16 (all P), 1Sa 9:8; once ´[[שִׁבְעָה שְׁקָלִים וַעֲשָׂרָה הַכּ]] Je 32:9.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: more oft. = money, measure of value and exchange (c. 112 t. ; not necess. coined) Ge 31:15, Ge 42:25, Ge 42:27 (E), Ge 43:12, Ge 43:12, Ge 43:15, Ge 43:18 (J), Ge 23:13, Le 27:18, Nu 3:48 (P), Ju Jdg 16:18, 1Ki 21:2, 2Ki 12:5 etc.; so Ps 68:31 Che, but see De Grill Bae, and Che:crit. n.; ´[[מִקְנַת כ]] one bought for money Ge 17:12, Ge 17:13, Ge 17:23, Ge 17:27, Ex 12:44 (all P); [[מִקְנׇתוֹ]] ´[[כ]] Le 25:51 (H) money for which he was bought; [[מָלֵא]] ´[[כ]] full price Ge 23:9 (P) 1Ch 21:22, 1Ch 21:24; [[כַּסְפֵּנוּ בְּמִשְׁקָלוֹ]] Ge 43:21 i.e. our money in full; [[מִמְכָרוֹ]] ´[[כ]] Le 25:50 the price of his sale; [[אָשָׁם]] ´[[כ]] 2Ki 12:7 trespass-money, [[חַטָּאוֹת]] ´[[כ]] v:2Ki 12:7 sin-money, [[הַכִּפֻּרִים]] ´[[כ]] Ex 30:16 atonement-money, [[הַפִּדְיוֹן]] ´[[כ]] Nu 3:49 redemption-money (both P); [[עֶרְכְְּ]] ´[[כ]] Le 27:15, Le 27:19 i.e. estimated value, etc.

among vbs. and phr. with ´[[כ]] are:—[[חרף]] try, refine, Zec 13:9, Is 48:10, Mal 3:3 a, Ps 12:7, Ps 66:10; [[זִקַּק]] Mal 3:3 b, (cf. [[הִתּוּח]] Ez Eze 22:22, √ [[נתך]], see v:Eze 22:20, v:Eze 22:21); [[יפּה]] beautify ´[[בכ]] Je 10:4; ´[[תָּפוּשׂ כ]] Hb Hab 2:19 encased with gold and silver; [[לְ]] ´[[שָׁקַל את־הַכּ]] weigh out the silver to or for a person Je 32:9, Ge 23:16 (P) Ezr 8:25, without [[לְ]] Je 32:10, cf. Ex 22:16 (E), 1Ki 20:39; ´[[ב]] ´[[שׁקל כ]] Is 55:2 = spend money for; [[מְחִירָהּ]] ´[[לאׁ יִשָּׁקֵל כ]] Job 28:15; ´[[וַיִּשְׁקְלוּ אֶת־שְׂכָרִי שׁלשׁים כ]] Zec 11:12; [[בַּקָּנֶה ישׁקלו]] ´[[כ]] Is 46:6, of wighing material for idol; ´[[מָכַר בכ]] sell for money Am 2:6, Ge 37:28 (J), De 21:14; ´[[נׇתַן בכ]] De 2:28 b, 1Ki 21:6, 1Ki 21:15, Ge 23:9 (P), 1Ch 21:22; also, of food, ´[[הִשְׁבִּיר ב]] De 2:28 a; [[השׂדה]] ´[[נתן כ]] Ge 23:13 (P) pay the price of the field; ´[[קָנׇה בְכ]] buy something for money Am 8:6, Je 32:25, Je 32:44, Is 43:24, 1Ch 21:24, cf. ´[[קָנׇה נֶפֶשׁ קִנְיַן כ]] Le 22:11 (H); ´[[שׁבר בכ]] De 2:6 a, Is 55:1; ´[[כרה בכ]] De 2:6 b; peculiar is its use with [[פָּדָה]], redeem (q.v.) in Nu 18:16; ´[[לקח כ]] receive money 2Ki 5:26, 2Ki 12:8, 2Ki 12:9; ´[[לָוׇה כ]] Ne 5:4 borrow money; [[הִלְוׇה]] Ex 22:24 (JE) lend money to (c. 2 acc.); [[בְּנֶשְֶׁ]] ´[[נתן כ]] give money on usury Le 25:37 (H), Ps 15:5; cf. [[לאׁ תַשִּׁיךְ]] ´[[לְאָחִיךָ נֶשֶׁךְ כ]] De 23:20.
